title: The exposure
description:
The exposure, exposing government lies,
this is my latest documentary, where I have compiled an arrange of different documents which the authorities here in Denmark have had on me, these documents will prove that many of their lies and accusations, are false and set in place to justify the it concept to the world,
The proof that I have shown in this video will prove this far beyond reasonable doubt, And will also give you a clear picture of the immense corruption that my government and its institutes, and others are involved in, regarding the it concept, As you have been told that the reason of the existence for the IT concept has been to solve horrendous sex crimes, this ground will be proven false and fraudulent, they have in fact been systematically lying to the world through their system and there collaborators in the media,  while they have been introducing this system and the technologies they have used in this program into the civilian world, under this false ground, This false ground have been shown and distributed through the system, where they have shown you movie fabrications as evidence for their accusations, this film will not only prove my innocence on many of these matters, but more importantly will show you that they have been lying from day one while they have implemented these technologies and the Stasi like methods in combination, 
This film will therefore give you a much clearer perspective for why the IT concept has been implemented to the world,
As this has never been about me and there accusations, but has had everything to do with the technologies that they, the establishments are using because of the enormous powers and benefits they can get by using a classified an unknown system on the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s populations for all the wrong reasons,
I have built this documentary up chronologically
First part Starts from 0 until 14 minutes: Intro and documents presentation from 1999 until June 2003. 
Second part starts from 14 minutes until 28: The letters between me and the chief prosecutor of North Jutland police and the district general attorney in Viborg
Third part starts from 28 minutes until one hour: phone conversations and face to face conversation with South Jutland police chief prosecutor, and management Department, and North Jutland police prosecutorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s office, and video footage from face-to-face conversation with South Jutland police prosecutor employee,
Part four starts from one hour until one hour 20 minutes: explanation the technologies used in this concept, ranging from synthetic telepathy, ionospheric propagation, building virtual fabrications, sending virtual fabrications, live feed, vibrational sounds, all the capabilities are explained and documented with relevant publication of different sortÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s.
Part five starts from one hour and 20 minutes until the end: documents presentation in 2003 case, 2007 case, 2008 case 2009 charge, all of which have been used in there fabrications of sex crimes, by taking specific elements out and changing and editing the given situations, and finally the conclusion,
